    • Method Detail

      • getConnection

        public ConnectionResult getConnection(Peer peer,
                                      TorrentId torrentId)
        Description copied from interface: IConnectionSource
        Get connection for a given peer and torrent ID. If the connection does not exist yet, then an attempt to establish a new ougoing connection is made. Blocks until the connection is established.
        Specified by:
        getConnection in interface IConnectionSource
        Returns:
        Newly established or existing connection or, possibly, an error in the form of ConnectionResult

      • getConnectionAsync

        public CompletableFuture<ConnectionResult> getConnectionAsync(Peer peer,
                                                              TorrentId torrentId)
        Description copied from interface: IConnectionSource
        Get connection for a given peer and torrent ID asynchronously.
        Specified by:
        getConnectionAsync in interface IConnectionSource
        Returns:
        Future, which, when done, will contain a newly established or existing connection or, possibly, an error in the form of ConnectionResult
